title: Johnson-Odim on women rulers in Africa - pattern

content.question: Which of the following describes a common pattern among West and West Central African women rulers?

choices.label: They ended the use of the slave trade in their kingdoms.
They expanded their territories by raiding East African territories.
They created societies that transferred power through military combat.
They acted with authority to maintain their power and territory.

content.answer: They acted with authority to maintain their power and territory.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
